thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 46 of 2268
thread.title: Mrs Hannah Kenny
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Hannah Kenny

author: Mrs Hannah Kenny
title: Mrs Hannah Kenny
text:
I ordered 2 products, a velux style blind to replace a broken one and a roller blind. The velux style blind was so easy to fit over half the price of the actual velux ones and you wouldn't even tell it's different from the other windows!
The delivery was brilliant. I have a 4 month old baby and the items were delivered by UPS. The delivery driver rang the bell just as my daughter drifted off to sleep in my arms so when I unlocked the door he quietly and carefully brought the delivery in for me and whispered for me to sign with my finger and then waved goodbye closing my door very carefully behind him!
A very kind and thoughtful delivery!
